name: @oletizi/audio-control
description: Monorepo for audio device control utilities

scripts.release:publish: pnpm changeset:version && pnpm -r build && pnpm changeset:publish
scripts.release:ship: pnpm -r build && git add . && git commit -m "chore(release): publish packages" && git push && pnpm changeset:publish
scripts.release:alpha:
echo '
ğŸ“¦ Alpha Release Workflow:
  1. Enter alpha mode (done by this command)
  2. Create changesets: pnpm changeset
  3. Publish: pnpm release:publish
  4. Exit alpha: pnpm release:pre:exit
' && changeset pre enter alpha && echo '
âœ… Alpha mode active. Now create changesets with: pnpm changeset'
scripts.release:beta:
echo '
ğŸ“¦ Beta Release Workflow:
  1. Enter beta mode (done by this command)
  2. Create changesets: pnpm changeset
  3. Publish: pnpm release:publish
  4. Exit beta: pnpm release:pre:exit
' && changeset pre enter beta && echo '
âœ… Beta mode active. Now create changesets with: pnpm changeset'
scripts.release:stable:
echo '
ğŸ“¦ Stable Release Workflow:
  1. Ensure you have exited prerelease mode
  2. Create changesets: pnpm changeset
  3. This command will: version + build + publish
' && pnpm release:publish
scripts.release:pre:exit: changeset pre exit && echo '\nâœ… Exited prerelease mode. Next changeset version will be stable.'
